Class LanternHttpProxyServer

java.lang.Object
  org.lantern.LanternHttpProxyServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpProxyServer, LanternService, Shutdownable
public class LanternHttpProxyServer
extends Object
implements HttpProxyServer

HTTP proxy server for local requests from the browser to Lantern.

public LanternHttpProxyServer(org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.ServerSocketChannelFactory serverChannelFactory,

                                     LanternTrustStore trustStore)
Creates a new proxy server.

Parameters:
httpLocalPort - The port the HTTP server should run on.
clientChannelFactory - The factory for creating outgoing client connections.
timer - The idle timeout timer.
serverChannelFactory - The factory for creating listening channels.
channelGroup - The group of all channels for convenient closing.
